jumper.name: SW13_M0
jumper.description: Impacts connection between flash_qspi and flash_bpi.If value=true, flash_qspi will be enabled

jumper.name: SW13_M1
jumper.description: Impacts connection between flash_qspi and flash_bpi.If value=true, flash_bpi will be enabled

jumper.name: J29_P1_P2
jumper.description: value=true will configure component phy to work in MII or GMII mode or RGMII mode based on J30 and J64

jumper.name: J29_P2_P3
jumper.description: value=true will configure component phy to work in SGMII mode.

jumper.name: J30_P1_P2
jumper.description: value=true will configure component phy to work in MII or GMII mode.

jumper.name: J30_P2_P3
jumper.description: value=true will configure component phy to work in SGMII mode.

jumper.name: J64
jumper.description: value=true will configure component phy either to work RGMII mode.

interface.name: ddr3_sdram
interface.description: DDR3 board interface, it can use MIG IP for connection.

interface.name: gmii
interface.description: Primary interface to communicate with ethernet phy in GMII mode.

interface.name: mii
interface.description: Primary interface to communicate with ethernet phy in MII mode.

interface.name: rgmii
interface.description: Primary interface to communicate with ethernet phy in RGMII mode.

interface.name: sgmii
interface.description: Primary interface to communicate with ethernet phy in SGMII mode.

interface.name: mdio_io
interface.description: Secondary interface to communicate with ethernet phy when mode is selected as MII,GMII,1000BaseX.

interface.name: mdio_mdc
interface.description: Secondary interface to communicate with ethernet phy when mode is selected as SGMII.

component_mode.name: mii
component_mode.description: To enable this mode jumpers need to be {J29_P1_P2 true} {J30_P1_P2 true} {J64 false}

component_mode.name: gmii
component_mode.description: To enable this mode jumpers need to be {J29_P1_P2 true} {J30_P1_P2 true} {J64 false}

component_mode.name: sgmii
component_mode.description: To enable this mode jumpers need to be {J29_P2_P3 true} {J30_P2_P3 true} {J64 false}

component_mode.name: rgmii
component_mode.description: To enable this mode jumpers need to be {J29_P1_P2 true} {J30_P1_P2 false} {J30_P2_P3 false} {J64 true}

component.name: rotary_switch
component.description: Edge Drive Jog Encoder Rotary Switch, INCB, PUSH, INCA, Active High

component.name: sys_diff_clock
component.description: 2.5V LVDS differential 200 MHz oscillator used as system differential clock on the board

component.name: phy_sfp
component.description: PHY outside the board connected through sfp

component.name: phy_sma
component.description: PHY outside the board connected through sma

component.name: phy_sma_lvds
component.display_name: PHY using SMA in LVDS mode
component.description: PHY outside the board connected through sma in lvds mode

component.name: linear_flash
component.description: 128 MB of nonvolatile storage that can be used for configuration or software storage

component_mode.name: linear_flash
component_mode.description: To enable this mode jumpers need to be {SW13_M0 false} {SW13_M1 true}

component.name: spi_flash
component.description: 128 MB of nonvolatile storage that can be used for configuration or data storage

component_mode.name: spi_flash
component_mode.description: To enable this mode jumpers need to be {SW13_M0 true} {SW13_M1 false}

component.name: rs232_uart
component.description: USB-to-UART Bridge, which allows a connection to a host computer with a USB port

component.name: reset
component.description: CPU Reset Push Button, Active High

component.name: push_buttons_5bits
component.description: Push Buttons, C W E S N, Active High
